mapper.select: select id from jnd_car where vin=#{vin}

select DISTINCT enginenum from jnd_car where enginenum=#{enginenum};
mapper.update: update jnd_car set status1=null where id=#{id}

update jnd_car
preinsuranceprice = #{preinsuranceprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
predrayageprice = #{predrayageprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
prelicenseprice = #{prelicenseprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
preoilprice = #{preoilprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
costprice= #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where contractid = #{contractid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `jnd_car` where 1=1
and `status`=0
and ( status1 is null and `status` BETWEEN 1 and 8 and datatype is null) or( status1 is null and `status` BETWEEN 1 and 8 and datatype=1)
AND ((status=2 AND datatype=1 and fstatus is null) OR (status=2 AND datatype IS NULL and fstatus is null))
and status in(2,3,4)
and `status`=1
and country=#{country}
